ygData.subject: Re: Greven and Demise
ygData.msgSnippet: Putnam gave a brief chuckle at Grevens response. They werent going to assist them back to planetside, they were going to assist them into the Inferno. Fire

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

       Putnam gave a brief chuckle at Grevens response. They werent going to 
assist them back to planetside, they were going to assist them into the 
Inferno.
       "Fire the Tripulse at them. It should be enough to get rid of them. 
And scan the area for the other Predacon vessles, keep weapons armed." 
Ominous commanded. 
       He then watched as a large blue blast exited the Tripulse canon. It 
soarded towrds Greven and Demise.

--part1_54.102108bb.27beebba_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
